__html:
AWS Athena

Datasource Parameters

Datasource Description
Datasource Select ATHENA.
Datasource name Enter the name of the DataSource.
Description Enter a description of the DataSource.
Username Set the AWS access key.
Password Set the AWS secret access key.
AwsRegion Set the AWS region.
Database name Enter the database name of the ATHENA connection.
Jdbc connection parameters Parameter settings for ATHENA connection, in JSON format.

Native Supported

  • No, read section example in datasource-setting DataSource Center section to activate this datasource.
  • JDBC driver configuration reference document athena-connect-with-jdbc
  • Driver download link SimbaAthenaJDBC-2.0.31.1000/AthenaJDBC42.jar
title: AWS Athena
